Llamar a Chernobyl
Redactar carta de presentación. Ver como venderme mejor.
~Correo Erasmus emprendedores a Rosa.~ ~Plan de empresa~ y rellenar todos los campos.


To whom it may concern:

My name is Guillermo and I am a fourth year student in Political Science and Administration. In order to finish my studies, I need 330 hours of work experience, be it in the form of a regular job or an internship. (Even if it may look like there is not much relation between my degree and your work, I assure you there is definitely an intersection. My studies are multidisciplinary and have prepared me to work at a wide variety of positions. As for me,) I have some amount of experience in different fields, such as HR, administrative support, communication and strategy, as well as a great array of interests. I can quickly learn how to effectively deliver on what I am tasked with doing, and I have repeatedly proven it every time I have been given the opportunity.
You will find attached to this message my CV, my universities' internship plan and two reference letters which act as proof of what I have described. One is from one of my former professors (originally written for the HBC) and the other one is from my current manager.
